00024 /*
00025  * Wrappers for kernel crypto shash api to pclmulqdq crc32c imlementation.
00026  *
00027  * Author:     James Simmons <jsimmons@infradead.org>
00028  */
00029 #include <linux/crc32.h>
00030 #include <crypto/internal/hash.h>
00031 #include <linux/crc32.h>
00032 #include <asm/cpufeature.h>
00033 #include <asm/i387.h>
00034 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00035 
00036 #define CHKSUM_BLOCK_SIZE       1
00037 #define CHKSUM_DIGEST_SIZE      4
00038 
00039 asmlinkage unsigned int crc_pcl(const u8 *buffer, int len,
00040                                 unsigned int crc_init);
00041 
00042 static int crc32c_pclmul_cra_init(struct crypto_tfm *tfm)
00043 {
00044         u32 *key = crypto_tfm_ctx(tfm);
00045 
00046         *key = ~0;
00047         return 0;
00048 }
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * Setting the seed allows arbitrary accumulators and flexible XOR policy
00052  * If your algorithm starts with ~0, then XOR with ~0 before you set
00053  * the seed.
00054  */
00055 static int crc32c_pclmul_setkey(struct crypto_shash *hash, const u8 *key,
00056                         unsigned int keylen)
00057 {
00058         u32 *mctx = crypto_shash_ctx(hash);
00059 
00060         if (keylen != sizeof(u32)) {
00061                 crypto_shash_set_flags(hash, CRYPTO_TFM_RES_BAD_KEY_LEN);
00062                 return -EINVAL;
00063         }
00064         *mctx = le32_to_cpup((__le32 *)key);
00065         return 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 static int crc32c_pclmul_init(struct shash_desc *desc)
00069 {
00070         u32 *mctx = crypto_shash_ctx(desc->tfm);
00071         u32 *crcp = shash_desc_ctx(desc);
00072 
00073         *crcp = *mctx;
00074         return 0;
00075 }
00076 
00077 static int crc32c_pclmul_update(struct shash_desc *desc, const u8 *data,
00078                                unsigned int len)
00079 {
00080         u32 *crcp = shash_desc_ctx(desc);
00081 
00082         kernel_fpu_begin();
00083         *crcp = crc_pcl(data, len, *crcp);
00084         kernel_fpu_end();
00085         return 0;
00086 }
00087 
00088 /* No final XOR 0xFFFFFFFF, like crc32_le */
00089 static int __crc32c_pclmul_finup(u32 *crcp, const u8 *data, unsigned int len,
00090                                 u8 *out)
00091 {
00092         kernel_fpu_begin();
00093         *(__le32 *)out = ~cpu_to_le32(crc_pcl(data, len, *crcp));
00094         kernel_fpu_end();
00095         return 0;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static int crc32c_pclmul_finup(struct shash_desc *desc, const u8 *data,
00099                               unsigned int len, u8 *out)
00100 {
00101         return __crc32c_pclmul_finup(shash_desc_ctx(desc), data, len, out);
00102 }
00103 
00104 static int crc32c_pclmul_digest(struct shash_desc *desc, const u8 *data,
00105                                unsigned int len, u8 *out)
00106 {
00107         return __crc32c_pclmul_finup(crypto_shash_ctx(desc->tfm), data, len,
00108                                     out);
00109 }
00110 
00111 static int crc32c_pclmul_final(struct shash_desc *desc, u8 *out)
00112 {
00113         u32 *crcp = shash_desc_ctx(desc);
00114 
00115         *(__le32 *)out = ~cpu_to_le32p(crcp);
00116         return 0;
00117 }
00118 
00119 static struct shash_alg alg = {
00120         .setkey         = crc32c_pclmul_setkey,
00121         .init           = crc32c_pclmul_init,
00122         .update         = crc32c_pclmul_update,
00123         .final          = crc32c_pclmul_final,
00124         .finup          = crc32c_pclmul_finup,
00125         .digest         = crc32c_pclmul_digest,
00126         .descsize       = sizeof(u32),
00127         .digestsize     = CHKSUM_DIGEST_SIZE,
00128         .base           = {
00129                         .cra_name               = "crc32c",
00130                         .cra_driver_name        = "crc32c-pclmul",
00131                         .cra_priority           = 150,
00132                         .cra_blocksize          = CHKSUM_BLOCK_SIZE,
00133                         .cra_ctxsize            = sizeof(u32),
00134                         .cra_module             = THIS_MODULE,
00135                         .cra_init               = crc32c_pclmul_cra_init,
00136         }
00137 };
00138 
00139 #ifndef X86_FEATURE_XMM4_2
00140 #define X86_FEATURE_XMM4_2      (4*32+20)       /* "sse4_2" SSE-4.2 */
00141 #endif
00142 
00143 int cfs_crypto_crc32c_pclmul_register(void)
00144 {
00145         if (!boot_cpu_has(X86_FEATURE_XMM4_2)) {
00146                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "CRC32 instruction is not detected.\n");
00147                 return -ENODEV;
00148         }
00149         return crypto_register_shash(&alg);
00150 }
00151 
00152 void cfs_crypto_crc32c_pclmul_unregister(void)
00153 {
00154         crypto_unregister_shash(&alg);
00155 }
